column5: Can someone let me know if this works out that they can see it ??   <object width="400" height="224" ><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true" /><param name="movie" value="http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220"'>http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220" /><embed src="http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" width="400" height="224"></embed></object>    it didnt work...back to the drawing board
Dave.. hit edit.. then "use full editor".. scroll down to bottom where it says options.. click that and select HTML On - Auto Breakline

2nd try ...  <object width="400" height="224" ><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true" /><param name="movie" value="http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220"'>http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220" /><embed src="http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" width="400" height="224"></embed></object>     ok i give up////please delete this thread
See above and try it again..

Here it is.... but looks like facebook is locked.... your gona have to figure out the settings in facebook  <object width="400" height="224" ><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true" /><param name="movie" value="http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220"'>http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220" /><embed src="http://www.facebook.com/v/10150492254375220" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" width="400" height="224"></embed></object>
thanks guys ...ill try it from photobucket..just thought it could be done from facebook
Wayne i think it worked.. i can see it anyways
No can see  Upload to photobucket, copy html code, paste in "post" and follow Wayne's instructions.

ok with the new knowledge i now have....lets see if this actually works...  <embed width="600" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowFullscreen="true" allowNetworking="all" wmode="transparent" src="http://static.photobucket.com/player.swf" flashvars="file=http%3A%2F%2Fvid763.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Fxx279%2FTwocoda%2FDSC_0143.mp4">

Thanks for confirming that i dood it right Bly...  The marble on my shoulders is getting sharper...it might not roll so good but at least people will get my point...lol...   Thanks Wayne....do i have to turn the html thingy for every video or can i just lock it on somehow?
Well your test video works! Please don't test any tickles....
